# Task #56 - Fix remaining hydration warnings - Completion Report
**Status**: COMPLETE
**Generated**: 2025-12-03T17:10:00Z
**Generated By**: Test-and-Cleanup Agent (combined workflow)

## Executive Summary
Successfully added `suppressHydrationWarning` attribute to 38 JSX elements across 13 files that use locale-dependent formatting methods (`.toLocaleDateString()` and `.toLocaleString()`). This prevents React hydration warnings when server and client locales differ.

No API changes required - this was a frontend-only fix.
